actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to deny special unemployment assistance in the case of certain employees of educational institutions.

summary.text: Denies special unemployment assistance under the Emergency Jobs and Unemployment Assistance Act of 1975 to employees of educational institutions during periods between academic years if such employee has a contract to perform services for the next academic year.

titles.title: A bill to deny special unemployment assistance in the case of certain employees of educational institutions.
